parameters.name: DateTime
parameters.description: Specify the date in the ISO 8601 standard. For example, 2023-01-01 represents January 1, 2023.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the request to retrieve a new page of results.

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
The basis on which you want to sort the query results. Valid values:

*   totalFileCount: the total number of files
*   totalDataSize: the total data size
*   totalDirCount: the total number of directories

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the query results. Valid values:

*   ASC: in ascending order
*   DESC: in descending order

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The filter condition. Valid values:

*   user
*   group
